column4: just messed up my /etc/network/interfaces file and i'm an idiot... how can i startup without network to adjust it?
clear what you want to do
i tried to setup bonding using http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=9517694&postcount=17 and now it's frozen on startup
yes as Loshki there is an entry for single user boot or recovery partition try that
